titles.title: Preventing Crimes Against Veterans Act of 2019
Preventing Crimes Against Veterans Act of 2019
A bill to amend title 18, United States Code, to provide an additional tool to prevent certain frauds against veterans, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary:
Preventing Crimes Against Veterans Act of 2019
This bill establishes a new criminal offense for knowingly engaging in a scheme to defraud an individual of veterans' benefits, or in connection with obtaining veteran's benefits for an individual. A violator is subject to criminal penalties—a fine, a prison term of up to five years, or both.
